title: Pennyweight to Grams Converter – dwt to g & Grams to Pennyweight

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Exact relationships 1 pennyweight (dwt) = 24 grains (gr) 1 grain = 0.06479891 grams ⇒ 1 dwt = 24 × 0.06479891 g = 1.55517384 grams

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Formula Let mdwt be the mass in pennyweight. grams = m_dwt × 1.55517384 Example: 10 dwt → 10 × 1.55517384 ≈ 15.5517 g

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Formula Let mg be the mass in grams. pennyweight = m_g ÷ 1.55517384 Example: 5 g → 5 ÷ 1.55517384 ≈ 3.214 dwt

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Troy relationships troy ounces: ozt = dwt ÷ 20 grains: grains = dwt × 24 Optional: carats (for gemstones) 1 carat = 0.2 g, so carats = grams ÷ 0.2.
